Title: It's Time to Kill the Turtle
Writer: John Wells (developed for american television by), Paul Abbott (creator), Nathan Jackson, Nancy Pimental
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: When Frank gives up drinking, Carl and Debbie enjoy having their dad back despite Lip's warning it won't last. Meanwhile, Fiona scrambles to find a better job.
